com.cyberfront.crdt.unittest.data

Class AssessmentSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.unittest.data.AssessmentSupport
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Test01Create.CreateTest, Test01Generic.GenericTest, Test01Json.JsonTest, Test01Simulation.SimulationTest, Test02Update.UpdateTest, Test03Clone.CloneTest, Test04Json

    public class AssessmentSupport
extends java.lang.Object
    The AssessmentSupport class is a base class for all of the unit test classes. It manages a number of attributes for test cases which comprise the collection of its derived classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean abbreviated
      Flag indicating whether the unit test derived from this class are to be abbreviated
      private static boolean ABBREVIATED
      Flag used to indicate whether or not to abbreviate the test
      private static long ABBREVIATED_FACTOR
      Division factor to apply to abbreviated tests
      private long abbreviatedFactor
      Division factor to reduce the various counts when running abbreviated tests.
      private com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper
      The ObjectMapper used to translate between JSON and any of the classes derived from com.cyberfront.crdt.unittest.data.AbstractDataType
      private boolean stressed
      Flag indicating whether the unit test derived from this class are to be stressed
      private static boolean STRESSED
      Flag used to indicate whether or not to perform a stress test
      private static long STRESSED_FACTOR
      Factor to apply during stress tests
      private long stressedFactor
      Factor used to enhance the various counts when attempting to test under higher stress levels
      private static long TRIAL_COUNT
      Constant defining the number of AbstractDataType elements to create in the unit test
      private long trialCount
      Number of trials to conduct in the unit test

      • AssessmentSupport

        public AssessmentSupport()
        Default class constructor which initializes the members to their default values given by the corresponding static constant values.

      • AssessmentSupport

        public AssessmentSupport(long trialCount,
                         long abbreviatedFactor,
                         long stressedFactor,
                         boolean abbreviated,
                         boolean stressed)
        Class constructor used to explicitly define the various parameters for the base test class
        Parameters:
        trialCount - Number of trials to perform over the course of the unit test
        abbreviatedFactor - Division factor to use on the argument when performing an abbreviated test
        stressedFactor - Multiplication factor to use on the arguments when performing a stress test
        abbreviated - Flag indicating whether this is an abbreviated test
        stressed - Flag indicating whether this is a stress test
